title: CryptoGodSon
author: CryptoGodSon
content: I'm Sound EngineerI've always been involved with music, so I would like to create something beautiful. For 16 years I have been creating background music, effects and everything related to sound. I worked with LucasArts to create background music and sound effects for Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith. Anything is possible for meIf you're interested please let me know and we can work out a deal.Thanks,CryptoGodSon BTC

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Move your topic to service board either for bitcoin section or altcoins section.And again you don't expect everyone here to believe an account with just one activity and one post just because he said he work on a song that was used in a popular movie, if you want forum members to believe you then youll have to show us evidence that indeed you really did that job and the fact that you have been producing songs for 16 years means you must have also produced some other wonderful songs/sounds. why don't you start bby showing us your portfolio tha way you mght be able to attract potential clients.

comments.author: CryptoGodSon
comments.body: No problem I will move it right now, I want to be more private - maybe thats why @Cantsay

comments.author: CryptoGodSon
comments.body: You don’t need to trust meI’m music engineer not your trust wallet.

comments.author: lagosnoir
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoGodSon on April 13, 2023, 02:08:07 AMYou don’t need to trust meI’m music engineer not your trust wallet.
